scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, all with golden halos, are depicted looking upwards. The figure on the far right, dressed in a blue robe, stands slightly apart from the others. To his left, a figure in a green robe holds a red book. Behind them, two figures in blue and red robes respectively, also look upwards. The background is a tessellated pattern of red, blue, and gold squares, suggesting a celestial or divine setting. The ground beneath them is a green grassy area.
